text: thumb|right|220px|Little Muddy River in winter The Little Muddy River is a tributary of the Missouri River, approximately long, in northwestern North Dakota in the United States. It rises in the prairie country of northern Williams County and flows west, then south, joining the Missouri near Williston. ==See also== *List of North Dakota rivers ==References== * Category:Rivers of North Dakota Category:Tributaries of the Missouri River Category:Bodies of water of Williams County, North Dakota
title: Little Muddy River (North Dakota)
